CrawleableResource - Interface in org.dice_research.squirrel.simulation
This interface defines the methods of a resource that is hosted in a CrawleableResourceContainer and can be used to simulate a resource that can be crawled.
CrawleableResourceContainer - Class in org.dice_research.squirrel.simulation
A simple Container implementation that can be used to host CrawleableResource instances.
CrawleableResourceContainer(CrawleableResource...) - Constructor for class org.dice_research.squirrel.simulation.CrawleableResourceContainer
